content: OK, I came up with an idea for a new game for us. I don't know if it'll work but this is how it goes. I'm going to post a pic of a well known individual taken during childhood. Your part is to identify the individual. If no one gets it in three days or so, I'll post the person's pic as they are now. Of course, hopefully you people will be posting childhood pics as well. Here is #1 NO CHEATING! How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?
